articles.title: “Where have those fast bowlers, who were bowling 140 kph till last year, disappeared?” - Rajkumar Sharma questions BCCI’s rehab programme - Sportskeeda
articles.description: Virat Kohli’s childhood coach Rajkumar Sharma has raised questions over BCCI’s rehabilitation programme, highlighting the lack of fast-bowling options in the white ball squad playing in New Zealand.
